wikipedia_page.main: Peter Perry (11 April 1936 – 19 April 2011) was an English footballer who played in the Football League for Rotherham United and York City. He was a member of Rotherham United's 1961 Football League Cup Final squad.

response: Peter Perry (November 14, 1792 – August 24, 1851) was a politician and businessman in Upper Canada.
*Portrait painting of Peter Perry at OurOntario.ca/Whitby
